# SOI FILES 2012-2015

```r

dat <- read.csv( "https://www.irs.gov/pub/irs-soi/15eofinextract990.dat.dat", sep=" ", skip=1 )

raw.names <- readLines( "https://www.irs.gov/pub/irs-soi/15eofinextract990.dat.dat", n=1 )

dat.names <- strsplit( raw.names, " ")[[1]]

names( dat ) <- dat.names

head( dat )
```
